ordr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

'ordr' package

A unified framework for ordination objects and biplot methods using tidy principles.

ordr

ordr package

Tidy ordination

The tbl_ord class wrapper, with methods for accessing components and for querying and manipulating metadata

recover_u() recover_v() recover_factor() get_u() get_v() get_factor() as.matrix(<tbl_ord>) recover_inertia() recover_coord() get_coord() dim(<tbl_ord>) dim_u() dim_v() dim_factor()

Access factors, coordinates, and metadata from ordination objects

augmentation_u() augmentation_v() augmentation_factor() augmentation.tbl_ord() augmentation_coord() augment(<tbl_ord>) augment_u() augment_v()

Augment metadata on the factors and coordinates of ordination objects

set_annotation_u() set_annotation_v() annotation_u() annotation_v()

Annotate the factors of an ordination object

recover_conference() get_conference() revert_conference() confer_inertia()

Confer inertia to factors of an ordination

get_alignment() revert_alignment() negate() permute() rotate() negation_to() negate_to() negate_to_nonneg_orthant() permutation_to() permute_to() rotation_to() rotate_to() align_to()

Alignment of ordinations

as_tbl_ord() make_tbl_ord() is_tbl_ord() is.tbl_ord() valid_tbl_ord() un_tbl_ord()

A unified ordination object class

reconstruct()

Reconstruct data from an ordination

format(<tbl_ord>) print(<tbl_ord>)

Formatting and printing methods for tbl_ords

pull_factor() pull_u() pull_v() rename_u() rename_v() select_u() select_v() mutate_u() mutate_v() transmute_u() transmute_v() bind_cols_u() bind_cols_v() left_join_u() left_join_v()

dplyr verbs for tbl_ord factors

Layered grammar for biplots

Functions to generate and annotate biplots from tbl_ord objects, following the layered grammar of graphics

fortify(<tbl_ord>) fortify_coord() fortify_u() fortify_v() tidy(<tbl_ord>)

Fortify a tbl_ord for plotting

ggbiplot() ord_aes()

Biplots following the grammar of graphics

stat_u() stat_v()

Render plot elements for one matrix of an ordination

geom_unit_circle()

Render a unit circle

geom_axis_ticks() geom_u_axis_ticks() geom_v_axis_ticks() geom_biplot_axis_ticks()

Render tick marks for axes

geom_axis() geom_u_axis() geom_v_axis() geom_biplot_axis()

Render axes through origin

geom_u_lineranges() geom_v_lineranges() geom_biplot_lineranges() geom_u_pointranges() geom_v_pointranges() geom_biplot_pointranges()

Render intervals depicting ranges, usually about center points

geom_isolines() geom_u_isolines() geom_v_isolines() geom_biplot_isolines()

Render isolines for a subject or variable

geom_u_path() geom_v_path() geom_biplot_path()

Render piecewise-linear paths through ordinates

geom_u_point() geom_v_point() geom_biplot_point()

Render points at ordinates

geom_u_polygon() geom_v_polygon() geom_biplot_polygon()

Render polygons around ordinates

geom_text_radiate() geom_u_text_radiate() geom_v_text_radiate() geom_biplot_text_radiate()

Render text at ordinates radiating out from the origin

geom_u_text() geom_v_text() geom_biplot_text() geom_u_label() geom_v_label() geom_biplot_label() geom_u_text_repel() geom_v_text_repel() geom_biplot_text_repel() geom_u_label_repel() geom_v_label_repel() geom_biplot_label_repel()

Render text at ordinates

geom_axis_text() geom_u_axis_text() geom_v_axis_text() geom_biplot_axis_text()

Render tick mark labels for axes

geom_vector() geom_u_vector() geom_v_vector() geom_biplot_vector()

Render vectors from origin to ordinates

stat_center() stat_u_center() stat_v_center() stat_star() stat_u_star() stat_v_star()

Compute geometric centers and spreads for ordination factors

stat_chull() stat_u_chull() stat_v_chull()

Restrict ordination data to the convex hulls of both matrix factors

stat_u_ellipse() stat_v_ellipse()

Compute normal confidence ellipses for ordination factors

stat_spantree() stat_u_spantree() stat_v_spantree()

Calculate a minimum spanning tree among cases or variables

draw_key_line() draw_key_crosslines() draw_key_crosspoint()

Biplot key drawing functions

New functions, classes, and methods

Introducing and adapting ordination techniques for the ordr workflow

eigen_ord() svd_ord()

Classes for workhorse matrix decompositions

lda_ord()

Augmented implementation of linear discriminant analysis

cmdscale() logisticSVD() logisticPCA() convexLogisticPCA()

Masks of external ordination objects

lra()

Log-ratio analysis

Data sets

Additional data sets used to illustrate ordination techniques

benthos

Marine species from sea-bed (benthic) samples

bioenv

Multivariate marine biological and environmental data

country_differences country_differences country_attributes

Student ratings of similarities and attributes of 13 countries

finches

Site-species occurrence data for Galapagos finches

issp_women

Original respondent-level data from Spanish ISSP sample
